meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Brenda Beck Bill Schantz Darlis Wood Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2463.

td.p: Brenda Beck, an actor from Los Angeles, California
Bill Schantz, a software support manager originally from Glen Ullin, North Dakota
Darlis Wood, a librarian from Berkeley, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $7,700)

tr.td: FAMOUS AMERICANS
SHAKESPEAREAN ACTORS
FRUITS & VEGETABLES
NATIONAL PARKS
OCCUPATIONS
CITY QUOTES
